title: How to promote my MLM link - Quora

response.answer_text: Promoting MLM using any media is a slippery slope. If distributors were allowed to openly promote their “business”, within days social media would be saturated with distributor websites promoting their MLM products/business. However, MLM is highly dependent on recruiting (because recruits represent the vast majority of product purchases and other corporate revenues), and who would join any MLM “opportunity” if a quick google search showed there were literally 1000’s of competitors located within 50 miles? For that reason, almost all MLMs have strict policies preventing freedom to promote…..unless you pay a fee to corporate and use their in-house approved sites…..at additional cost.
